document.discussion_title: Shooting and stabbing reported at Taunton, Mass., mall
document.topic_text: Google Police have responded to the Silver City Galleria in Taunton, Mass. A shooting and stabbing has been reported at the Silver City Galleria mall in Taunton, Mass. Police were “still fielding 911 calls” at 7:15 p.m., a Taunton police dispatcher told the Daily News. “It’s an active situation,” the dispatcher said. The mall was evacuated after multiple shot were fired sometime around 7, WBZ reported. A car crashed into the Macy's at the shopping center before multiple people were stabbed and shots were fired, the news station reported. almost just walked right into a shooting and stabing at the taunton mall good thing i was smokin a blunt walkin in pic.twitter.com/mvdPrxV5k1 — mAce (@alexcmace) May 10, 2016 Exact details on the number of injured are unclear. The Massachusetts State Police responded to assist at the scene with crime scene services and detectives, the agency tweeted. THIS IS BREAKING NEWS. CHECK BACK FOR UPDATES. Join the Conversation:
